Index of /public/ftp/pub/Linux/system/emulators/zx

What you'll find here: emulators for Sinclair ZX80/ZX81/Spectrum

You can also view this index in terse format, or return to the parent directory.

spconv-1.09.tgz (LSM entry?) 1995-08-30
converts between various snapshot formats (24570 bytes)
spectemu-0.92.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1998-04-03
Sinclair ZX Spectrum emulator for Linux (188901 bytes)
xzx-2.9.0.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1999-05-12
ZX Spectrum emulator (338960 bytes)
xzx-binary-2.1.3.tar.gz (LSM entry) (README) 1997-04-22
precompiled binaries for xzx (199789 bytes)
xzx-contrib-2.7.4.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1999-03-07
Contribution tools for XZX (152431 bytes)
z81-1.1.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1999-03-20
text mode, SVGAlib, and X-based emulators for Sinclair ZX81 (251866 bytes)
zmakebas-1.0.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1999-03-20
converts a Spectrum Basic program written as a text file into an actual speccy Basic file (13988 bytes)
zspeccyutils-1.0.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1999-04-24
a collection of Sinclair ZX Spectrum related utils (77751 bytes)
